title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - March 23rd, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - March 23rd, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

It’s the Bloomberg Businessweek Equality Issue

Featuring:

-Jeanna Smialek on how inequality is holding economies back.

-Josh Eidelson profiles trans workers facing widespread discrimination.

-Jeff Green on how Dow Chemical became a bastion of equality

-Dune Lawrence on a Chinese dating app that is helping gay men connect with surrogates.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
